title: Israel Average Monthly Wages
description: Wages in Israel increased to 12274 ILS/Month in August from 12130.50 ILS/Month in July of 2022. Wages in Israel averaged 9379.57 ILS/Month from 2005 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 12831.60 ILS/Month in April of 2020 and a record low of 7186 ILS/Month in February of 2005. In Israel, wages are benchmarked using average monthly earnings. This page provides - Israel Average Monthly Wages - actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: Central Bureau of Statistics, Israel
